name: Life Sacrificer
description:
In this procedurally generated roguelike you have to shoot yourself trough hoards of enemies to get to the final boss, for an incredible reward!

Sacrifice your health to get upgrades! (LESS health is MORE upgrades).

Controls are explained in-game. You get a health refill after killing 20 enemies and after getting to the boss.

Known Issues
- The tutorial says 30 enemies must be killed but it is actually 40

Controls
Move - WASD/Arrow keys
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - LMB
Manually reload - R
Dash - Space
Shoot immobilizing bullets - RMB
Summon blackhole - Shift
Toggle full screen - Alt + Enter/F11
Pause - Escape/p
